sentences.sContent: They offer help and advice to anyone interested in becoming a teacher.
sentences.sCn: 他们为任何有兴趣当老师的人提供帮助和咨询。

sentences.sContent: If anyone sees Lisa, ask her to call me.
sentences.sCn: 如果有谁看见莉萨，叫她打电话给我。

sentences.sContent: Anyone else who is interested in going on the trip should see me at the end of this lesson.
sentences.sCn: 还有谁有兴趣参加此次旅行，下课来找我。

trans.tranOther: used to refer to any person, when it is not important to say exactly who
